name: Jazz Jackrabbit 2
description:
The PC's very own Platform hero is back...And this time it's double trouble. Jazz, with the help of his spaced out brother, Spaz, sets out to conquer the rampaging reptile Devan. Full of incredibly fast game play, Jazz JackRabbit 2 lets you fly, swim and warp your way through over 40 levels of non-stop action!
Encounter the enemy and outwit their advanced artificial intelligence. Create your own levels using the Jazz Creation Station.
And if you've got any energy left, Jazz up your social life with up to four deliriously fun multi-player modes including modem, LAN and Internet play.

* Advanced enemy Artificial Intelligence.
* Incredibly fast-paced game play.
* Fly, swim and warp your way through over 40 levels of non-stop action!
* Deliriously fun Party Mode: Jazz up your social life with four-mode multi-player gaming: two to four players on one scree; up to eight players on two screens via modem; up to 32 players on eight screens via LAN or the Internet!
* Easy to use level editor, Jazz Creation Station, that lets players create their own levels.
